alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Custer; Dewey; Greer; Harmon; Major; Woods (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued February 28 at 12:49AM CST until February 28 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Red flag warning for parts of western Oklahoma Tuesday afternoon... .Dry conditions and gusty winds will contribute to favorable fire conditions during the afternoon and evening on Tuesday. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY AND GUSTY WINDS FOR PARTS OF WESTERN OKLAHOMA... The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a Red Flag Warning for low relative humidity and gusty winds, which is in effect from noon today to 6 PM CST this evening. * TIMING...Noon to 600 PM. * WINDS...Southwest 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 9 percent. * TEMPERATURES...71 to 76 degrees. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop could spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is discouraged.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures will contribute to extreme fire behavior.
